alert.note: Alert for Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake County through 515 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairport Harbor, moving northeast at 35 mph. This storm is going to track right along the lakeshore and could loft hail onto land. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Fairport Harbor, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Madison, Perry, Mentor-On-The-Lake, North Perry, Grand River and North Madison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
